word: die Finanz, die There seems to be a mistake in the example provided. "article finanz" is not a valid singular noun, so it cannot have a plural form.
definition: A term commonly employed to refer to the management and allocation of monetary resources within an organization, government, or individual's financial affairs. It encompasses activities related to budgeting, investing, accounting, and financial planning.

examples.german: Die Finanzierung des Projekts wurde genehmigt.
examples.english: The financing of the project was approved.
He works in the finance sector.

examples.german: Die Finanzkrise hat zu vielen Arbeitsplatzverlusten geführt.
examples.english: The financial crisis has led to many job losses.

examples.german: Sie hat ein Studium der Finanzwirtschaft abgeschlossen.
examples.english: She has completed a degree in financial management.
